            <h2 class="message-header A-TYP22L-RW-ALL">Beware of Phishing SMS</h2>
            <button class="close-message-button" data-message-id="29c471c83c">
                <span class="icon icon-delete" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="visuallyhidden"></span>

        <div class="sm-12 lg-8">
            <div class="message-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"><p>HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers. All our one-way SMS bears IDs starting with '#' only. Stay vigilant! <a href="/help/cybersecurity-and-fraud/phishing/">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div>

    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Structured products are investment products. Structured products are complex in nature and may involve derivatives. The investment decision is yours. Where an intermediary is involved in a sale, you should not invest unless they have confirmed to you that the product is suitable for you having regard to your financial situation, investment experience and investment objectives.</li> 
 <li>Investors should not make an investment decision based on this marketing material alone.</li> 
 <li>Investment involves risk and past performance is not indicative of future performance. Please refer to the offering documents for further details, including product features, fees and charges, and risk factors.</li> 
 <li>The price of products may move up or down. Losses may be incurred rather than profit made as a result of buying and selling products.</li> 
 <li>Issuer's risk – Structured products are subject to both the actual and perceived measures of creditworthiness of the issuer. There is no assurance of protection against a default by the issuer in respect of the repayment obligations. In the worst case scenario, you might not be able to recover the principal and interest/coupon if the issuer defaults on the structured products.</li> 
 <li>Structured products are <strong>not</strong> equivalent to time deposits. and are <strong>not</strong> protected deposits, and they are <strong>not</strong> protected by the Deposit Protection Scheme in Hong Kong. Deposit Plus, some ELIs, PPNs and SNs are not principal-protected.</li> 
 <li>Additional risks are disclosed in the <a href="#risk-disclaimer" target="_self">risk disclosure – structured products</a> section. Please refer to it for details.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_8" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">With 100% principal protection at maturity, capture opportunities from the interest rate cycle. Lock the enhanced potential interest rate for longer tenor.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This is available in different currencies and payout structures:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><strong>Callable Snowball Fixed Rate Note / Callable Linear Coupon Note with Bonus Coupon Note</strong> to accrue potentially higher coupon till payout at maturity or early call with additional opportunity to receive one-off bonus coupon.</li> 
 <li><strong>Range Accrual Note</strong> to accrue potentially higher coupon daily when all predetermined criteria are fulfilled.</li> 
 <li><strong>Capped Floored Floating Rate Note</strong> to receive minimum return with potential to earn higher interest with cap.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Contact your relationship manger or visit our branch to learn more.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Our award-winning Equity Linked Investments (ELI) online trading platform makes investing simpler and more convenient.<br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>100% principal protected and non-principal protected solutions available</li> 
 <li>Customise your own product online<sup><a href="#fn-customiseowneli" data-back-link-connected=""><span aria-hidden="true">1</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Footnote link 1</span></a></sup>,<sup><a href="#fn-investment-selected-products-only" data-back-link-connected=""><span aria-hidden="true">2</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Footnote link 2</span></a></sup> with access to more than 250 Hong Kong and US listed securities<sup><a href="#fn-investment-selected-products-only" data-back-link-connected=""><span aria-hidden="true">2</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Footnote link 2</span></a></sup></li> 
 <li>Use Scenario Analysis<sup><a href="#fn-investment-selected-products-only" data-back-link-connected=""><span aria-hidden="true">2</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Footnote link 2</span></a></sup> to view possible payouts of the specific product selected</li> 
 <li>Guided journeys and filters to narrow down products according to you selection criteria</li> 
 <li>Reference underlying past performance</li> 
</ul>

<div id="pp_tools_columnControl_20">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-66-33  ">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

<h2 class="heading A-TYP28L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="pp_tools_heading_20">
    Find out more
</h2>
</div>

        
    


        </div>

<div id="pp_tools_columnControl_21">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-66-33  ">
        
        <div id="pp_tools_columnControlColumn_41" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="pp_tools_accordion_3" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_tools_advanced_expander_3" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1886755259__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1886755259__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What are structured products? How do they work? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1886755259__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_tools_columnControl_22">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_tools_columnControlColumn_42" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_17" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Structured products are investment instruments embedded with derivatives. That means their return, the amount due and/or the settlement method is determined by references to either or both:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>changes in the price, value and/or level of one or more reference underlying assets</li> 
 <li>the occurrence or non-occurrence of an event</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_tools_advanced_expander_4" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="539829551__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="539829551__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I benefit from investing in structured products? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="539829551__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_tools_columnControl_23">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_tools_columnControlColumn_43" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_18" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There are a few ways you may benefit from investing in structured products:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Return: by participating in the performance of various underlying assets to achieve higher potential returns under certain market situations</li> 
 <li>Capital protection: some structured products offer investors principal protection at maturity</li> 
 <li>Callable feature: some structured products come with an auto-callable or callable feature, which lets investors receive their investment capital earlier than at maturity</li> 
 <li>Portfolio diversification: by participating in the performance of different assets or markets</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_tools_advanced_expander_5" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="2013922358__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="2013922358__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is a Pre-Investment Cooling-off Period (PICOP)? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="2013922358__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_tools_columnControl_24">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_tools_columnControlColumn_44" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_19" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Effective from 1 January 2011, a Pre-Investment Cooling Off Period arrangement is required by the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) for non-listed derivative product purchases via branch to enhance investor protection to ensure that customers have sufficient time to consider the non-listed derivative product purchase.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Pre-Investment Cooling-off Period (PICOP) is applicable to each particular dealing of the Structured Products if investor is one of the following retail customer types:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>An elderly customer aged 65 or above, unless investor is not a first-time buyer of that particular type of structured products AND investor's asset concentration^ is below 20% AND investor opts out from the PICOP arrangement; or</li> 
 <li>A non-elderly investor who is a first time buyer of that particular type of structured products AND investor's asset concentration is 20% or above.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If Pre-Investment Cooling-off Period is applicable to investor, investor can only subscribe for the product at least 2 calendar days (of which the last day should be a business day) after product discussion with the Bank. This is to ensure that investor have sufficient time to understand the product and consider the appropriateness of the investment before deciding on the subscription.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">^ For the purpose of determining whether PICOP is applicable, asset concentration refers to the percentage of total net worth (excluding real estate properties) to be invested in this product.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_tools_advanced_expander_6" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-914841311__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-914841311__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is a post-sale cooling-off period? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-914841311__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_tools_columnControl_25">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_tools_columnControlColumn_45" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_20" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If the investment period of the equity-linked investment customers subscribe is more than one year, customer can cancel or unwind (as the case may be) the whole of the equity-linked investment purchase order during the period from (and including) the date customers place the purchase order to (and including) the fifth Hong Kong business day after the order date (this period is referred to as the post-sales cooling-off period), and get back the issue price minus any negative market value adjustment. Please refer to the Product Booklet for details. The Bank does not apply any handling charge on such cancel or unwind order. If customers choose to cancel or unwind the equity-linked investment purchase order during the post-sales cooling off period, please contact our branch between 10:00am and 12:00 noon on any Hong Kong business day during the post-sales cooling-off period. Our staff will help you complete the sell order form.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_tools_advanced_expander_7" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-258197149__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-258197149__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Will I be charged any fees for purchasing a structured product? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-258197149__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_tools_columnControl_26">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_tools_columnControlColumn_46" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_21" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Generally, you won't be charged any additional fees when you invest in structured products with us. Any operational, administrative and hedging costs are covered when we calculate the return income and other variables of the product.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you choose physical settlement for an equity-linked investment or note, you'll be charged a deposit transaction fee and stamp duty for the underlying assets to be deposited in your investment account.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_tools_advanced_expander_8" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-826172400__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-826172400__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I sell a structured product before maturity? Will I be penalised? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-826172400__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_tools_columnControl_27">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_tools_columnControlColumn_47" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_22" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can sell equity-linked investments or notes, and interest rate-linked capital-protected investments early, subject to the terms listed in the individual product offering document. The early sell-back price will be subject to prevailing market conditions and may be less than the principal amount of your original investment.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_1" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>Disclaimer</strong></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The information shown on this website is neither a recommendation, an offer, nor a solicitation for any investment product or service. Investment involves risk. You should carefully consider whether any investment product or service mentioned herein is appropriate for you in view of your personal circumstances. Past performance is no guide to future performance. Investors should refer to the individual product explanatory memorandum or offering document for further details and risks involved. The price of investment products may move up or down. Losses may be incurred as well as profits made as a result of buying and selling investment products.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Structured products involve derivatives. The investment decision is yours but you should not invest in structured products unless the intermediary who sells it to you has explained to you that the product is suitable for you having regard to your financial situation, investment experience and investment objectives.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Structured products are NOT equivalent to time deposits. They are not protected deposits and are not protected by the Deposit Protection Scheme in Hong Kong.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Issuer's risk – You will be relying on the issuer's creditworthiness. The products are subject to both the actual and perceived measures of the credit worthiness of the issuer and there is no assurance of protection against a default by the issuer in respect of their payment obligations.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">In the worst-case scenario (eg insolvency of issuer), you may get nothing back and the potential maximum loss could be 100% of investment amount with no coupon received.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Deposit Plus and structured investment deposits are not available for customers who hold US nationality, who are US citizens, residents or tax payers, or hold any US address (eg a primary mailing, residence or business address in the US).</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>Risk Disclosure - Private Placement Notes (PPN) and Structured Notes (SN)</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The following risks should be read together with the other risks contained in the "Risk Factors" section in the relevant offering documents of the PPNs and SNs</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">You should note that the information contained in this website does NOT form part of the offering documents of our PPNs and SNs. You should read all the offering documents of our PPNs and SNs (including the offering memorandum, and the indicative term sheet) before deciding whether to invest in our PPNs and SNs. If you have doubt on the content of this website, you should seek independent professional advice.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not a time deposit – PPNs and SNs are NOT equivalent to, nor should it be treated as a substitute for, time deposit. It is NOT a protected deposit and is NOT protected by the Deposit Protection Scheme in Hong Kong.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not principal protected – Some PPNs and SNs are not principal protected: you could lose all of your investment.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Investment Return Risk – It is possible that you may not receive any potential cash dividend amount for the entire scheduled tenor of the PPNs and SNs.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Re-investment risk – If our PPNs and SNs are early terminated, we will pay you the nominal amount of the PPNs and SNs (less any cash settlement expenses) and any accrued potential cash dividend amount calculated up to (and including) that call date. No further potential cash dividend amount will be payable following such early termination. Market conditions may have changed and you may not be able to enjoy the same rate of return if you re-invest these proceeds in other investments with similar risk parameters.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">No collateral – PPNs and SNs are not secured on any of our assets or any collateral.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Limited market making arrangements are available and you may suffer a loss if you sell your PPNs and SNs before expiry - Our PPNs and SNs are designed to be held to their settlement date. Limited market making arrangements are available on a bi-weekly basis for all our PPNs and SNs. If you try to sell your PPNs and SNs before expiry, the amount you receive for each PPN and SN may be substantially less than the issue price you paid for each PPN and SN.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not the same as investing in the reference asset – Investing in our PPNs and SNs is not the same as investing in the reference asset. Changes in the market price of the reference asset may not lead to a corresponding change in the market value of, or your potential payout under, the PPNs and SNs.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not covered by Investor Compensation Fund – Our PPNs and SNs are not listed on any stock exchange and are not covered by the Investor Compensation Fund. There may not be any active or liquid secondary market.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Maximum loss upon issuer’s default or insolvency – Our PPNs and SNs constitute general, unsecured and unsubordinated contractual obligations of issuer and of no other person. When you buy our PPNs and SNs, you will be relying on issuer’s creditworthiness. If issuer becomes insolvent or defaults on its obligations under the PPNs and SNs, in the worst case scenario, you could lose all of your investment.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Risks relating to RMB – You should note that the value of RMB against other foreign currencies fluctuates and will be affected by, amongst other things, the PRC government's control (for example, the PRC government regulates conversion between RMB and foreign currencies), which may adversely affect your return under this product when you convert RMB into your home currency. The value of your RMB-denominated PPNs and SNs will be subject to the risk of exchange rate fluctuation. If you choose to convert your RMB deposit to other currencies at an exchange rate that is less favourable than that in which you made your original conversion to RMB, you may suffer loss in principal. This product (if denominated in RMB) will be denominated and settled in RMB deliverable in Hong Kong, which is different from that of RMB deliverable in Mainland China.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">You may, at settlement, receive physical delivery of reference asset(s).</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Our PPNs and SNs may be terminated early by us according to the terms as set out in offering documents of our PPNs and SNs.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Our PPNs and SNs are structured investment products which are embedded with derivatives.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Investment returns (if any) not denominated in home currency are exposed to exchange rate fluctuations. Rates of exchange may cause the value of investments to go up or down.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Risk Free Rates (RFRs) are not free of risk, hence they are considered "near risk-free". RFRs can rise or fall as a result of changing economic conditions and central bank policy decisions.<br> The Coupon for a Note based on an RFR may be calculated based on a series of overnight rates compounded over the relevant interest period. Therefore, the Coupon payable under such a Note may only be known at or near the end of that interest period and it may be difficult for you to estimate reliably the amount of Coupon which will be payable.<br> The market continues to develop the use of, and alternatives to, RFR. Therefore, it is possible that market participants or a significant part thereof may adopt applications of, and /or methodologies for, the calculation of RFR which differ. In such circumstances, the Coupon amount with respect to the Notes may differ over time and depending on the calculation and/or methodology used at that time.<br> Daily changes in the RFR may be more volatile than daily changes in comparable benchmark or market rates and, as such, the return or payments on a Note linked to an RFR may fluctuate more than in the case of a Note that is linked to a less volatile rate.<br> The RFR market is still developing. It is possible that future changes to market practice or conventions relating to the use of RFRs may result in the Issuer amending the definition and/or the use of RFR. It cannot be predicted how such future changes may impact the Notes and such changes may have an adverse impact in your investment in the Notes.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The information contained in this website have not been reviewed by the Securities and Futures Commission of Hong Kong or any regulatory authority in Hong Kong.</p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Investment involves risk. The price of structured products may move up or down. Losses may be incurred as well as profits made as a result of buying and selling structured products.</p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">You should carefully consider whether any investment products or services mentioned herein are appropriate for you in view of your investment experience, objectives, financial resources and circumstances.</p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Making available to you any advertisements, marketing or promotional materials, market information or other information relating to a product or service shall not, by itself, constitute solicitation of the sale or recommendation of any product or service. If you wish to receive solicitation or recommendation from us, please contact us and, where relevant, go through our suitability assessment before transacting.</p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The information contained in this website does not constitute a solicitation or recommendation for making any deposit or an offer for the purchase or sale or investment in any products.</p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>Risk disclosure – Deposit Plus</strong></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not a time deposit – Deposit Plus is NOT equivalent to, nor should it be treated as a substitute for, time deposit. It is NOT a protected deposit and is NOT protected by the Deposit Protection Scheme in Hong Kong.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Derivatives risk – Deposit Plus is embedded with FX option(s). Option transactions involve risks, especially when selling an option. Although the premium received from selling an option is fixed, you may sustain a loss well in excess of such premium amount, and your loss could be substantial.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Limited potential gain – The maximum potential gain is limited to the interest on the deposit.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Maximum potential loss – Deposit Plus is not principal-protected. You must be prepared to incur loss as a result of depreciation in the value of the currency paid (if the deposit is converted to the linked currency at maturity). Such loss may offset the interest earned on the deposit and may even result in losses in the principal amount of the deposit.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not the same as buying the linked currency – Investing in Deposit Plus is not the same as buying the linked currency directly.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Market risk – The net return of Deposit Plus will depend upon the exchange rate of the deposit currency against the linked currency prevailing at the deposit fixing time on the deposit fixing date. Movements in exchange rates can be unpredictable, sudden and drastic, and affected by complex political and economic factors.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Liquidity risk – Deposit Plus is designed to be held until maturity. You do not have a right to request early termination of this product before maturity. Under special circumstances, HSBC has the right to accept your early redemption request at its sole discretion and on a case by case basis. HSBC will provide an indication of the redemption price upon such request. Your return upon such early redemption will likely be lower than that if the deposit were held until maturity and may be negative.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Credit risk of the Bank – Deposit Plus is not secured by any collateral. When you invest in this product, you will be relying on HSBC's creditworthiness. If HSBC becomes insolvent or defaults on its obligations under this product, you can only claim as an unsecured creditor of HSBC. In the worst case, you could suffer a total loss of your deposit amount.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Currency risk – If the deposit currency and/or linked currency is not your home currency, and you choose to convert it back to your home currency upon maturity, you may make a gain or loss due to exchange rate fluctuations.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Risks relating to RMB – You should note that the value of RMB against other foreign currencies fluctuates and will be affected by, amongst other things, the PRC government's control (eg the PRC government regulates conversion between RMB and foreign currencies), which may adversely affect your return under this product. The value of your investment will be subject to the risk of exchange rate fluctuation. In case you receive RMB as the linked currency at maturity and you choose to convert your maturity proceeds to other currencies, you may suffer loss in principal. This product will be denominated (if the deposit currency is in RMB) and settled (received in RMB at maturity) in RMB deliverable in Hong Kong, which is different from that of RMB deliverable in mainland China.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>Risk disclosure – Capital Protected Investment – Currency-linked III (CPI III)</strong></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not a time deposit – CPI III is NOT equivalent to, nor should it be treated as a substitute for, time deposit. It is NOT a protected deposit and is NOT protected by the Deposit Protection Scheme in Hong Kong.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Derivatives risk – CPI III is embedded with FX option(s). Option transactions involve risks. If the exchange rate of the currency pair performs against expectation at the fixing time on the fixing date, you can only earn the minimum payout of the structure.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Limited potential gain – The maximum potential gain is limited to higher payout on the deposit less the principal amount, when exchange rate of currency pair at fixing moves in line with your anticipated direction.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Not the same as buying the linked currency – Investing in CPI III is not the same as buying the linked currency directly.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Market risk – The return of CPI III will depend upon the exchange rates of currency pair against trigger rate at the fixing time on the fixing date. Movements in exchange rates can be unpredictable, sudden and drastic, and affected by complex political and economic factors. You must be prepared to take the risk of earning the lower payout/no return (if the exchange rate performs against expectations) on the money invested.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Liquidity risk – CPI III is designed to be held until maturity. You do not have a right to request early termination of this product before its maturity. Under special circumstances, HSBC has the right to accept your early redemption request at its sole discretion and on a case-by-case basis. The Bank will provide an indication of the redemption price upon such request. Your return upon such early redemption will likely be lower than if the deposit were held until maturity and may be negative.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Credit risk of the Bank – CPI III is not secured by any collateral. When you invest in this product, you will be relying on the HSBC's creditworthiness. If HSBC becomes insolvent or defaults on its obligations under this product, you can only claim as an unsecured creditor of HSBC. In the worst case, you could suffer a total loss of your deposit amount.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Currency risk – If the deposit currency is not your home currency, and you choose to convert it back to your home currency upon maturity, you may make a gain or loss due to exchange rate fluctuations.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Risk of early termination by HSBC – HSBC shall have the discretion to uplift a deposit or any part thereof prior to the maturity date (subject to the deduction of such break costs or the addition of such proportion of the return or redemption amount, which may result in a figure less than the original principal amount of the deposit) if it determines, in its sole discretion, that this is necessary or appropriate to protect any right of HSBC to combine accounts or set-off, or any security interest, or to protect the customer's interests.</span></li>
 <li><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Risks relating to RMB – You should note that the value of RMB against other foreign currencies fluctuates and will be affected by, amongst other things, the PRC government's control (eg the PRC government regulates conversion between RMB and foreign currencies), which may adversely affect your return under this product when you convert RMB into your home currency. The value of your RMB deposit will be subject to the risk of exchange rate fluctuation. If you choose to convert your RMB deposit to other currencies at an exchange rate that is less favourable than that in which you made your original conversion to RMB, you may suffer loss in principal. This product (if denominated in RMB) will be denominated and settled in RMB deliverable in Hong Kong, which is different from that of RMB deliverable in mainland China.</span></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"><strong>Risk disclosure – Equity-linked Investments (ELIs)</strong></p>

<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">Making available to you any advertisements, marketing or promotional materials, market information or other information relating to a product or service shall not, by itself, constitute solicitation of the sale or recommendation of any product or service. <p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">The information contained in this website does not constitute a solicitation for making any deposit or an offer for the purchase or sale or investment in any products.</p>
